titles.title: Am I a Soldier of the Cross? (Isaac Watts)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Am I a soldier of the cross, A follower of the Lamb, And shall I fear to own His cause, Or blush to speak His name?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Must I be carried to the skies On flowery beds of ease, While others fought to win the prize, And sailed through bloody seas? Are there no foes for me to face? Must I not stem the flood? Is this vile world a friend to grace, To help me on to God?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When that illustrious day shall rise, And all Thy armies shine In robes of victory through the skies, The glory shall be Thine.{/lang-eng}
